members.name: OfficeRuntime
ApiInformation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Check if the specified requirement set is supported by the host Office application.
 *
 * @param name - Set name; e.g., "MatrixBindings".
 *
 * @param minVersion - The minimum required version; e.g., "1.4".
 */
members.name: isSetSupported
apiInformation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Interface that contains authorization related APIs.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: Auth

members.docComment:
/**
 * Calls the Azure Active Directory V 2.0 endpoint to get an access token to your add-in's web application. Enables add-ins to identify users. Server side code can use this token to access Microsoft Graph for the add-in's web application by using the {@link https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/active-directory-v2-protocols-oauth-on-behalf-of | "on behalf of" OAuth flow}. This API requires a single sign-on configuration that bridges the add-in to an Azure application. Office users sign-in with Organizational Accounts and Microsoft Accounts. Microsoft Azure returns tokens intended for both user account types to access resources in the Microsoft Graph.
 *
 * Important: In Outlook, this API is not supported if the add-in is loaded in an Outlook.com or Gmail mailbox.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * **Hosts**: Excel, PowerPoint, Word
 *
 * @param options - Optional. Accepts an AuthOptions object to define sign-on behaviors. returns: Promise to the access token.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: getAccessToken

members.docComment:
/**
 * Contains authorization related APIs.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: auth

members.docComment:
/**
 * Provides options for the user experience when Office obtains an access token to the add-in from AAD v. 2.0 with the getAccessToken method.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: AuthOptions
allowConsentPrompt
allowSignInPrompt
asyncContext
authChallenge
forceAddAccount
forMSGraphAccess

members.docComment:
/**
 * Represent an individual control or command whose state is set with the call to `requestUpdate`.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: Control
enabled
id
Dialog

members.docComment:
/**
 * Method to close a dialog box. Returns a Promise.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 */
members.name: close

members.docComment:
/**
 * Method that enables a pop up web dialog box.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 *
 * @param url - Must be a string.
 *
 * @param options - Optional parameter. Must be of type DisplayWebDialogOptions.
 */
members.name: displayWebDialog
DisplayWebDialogOptions

members.docComment:
/**
 * Optional parameter that determines whether the dialog box displays as a popup (false) or within an IFrame (true). This setting is only applicable to custom functions running on Excel Online.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 */
members.name: displayInIFrame

members.docComment:
/**
 * Optional parameter that defines the height of the dialog box as a percentage of the current display. For example, accepts strings such as: '50%', '50'.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 */
members.name: height

members.docComment:
/**
 * Optional callback that runs when the dialog box is closed.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 */
members.name: onClose

members.docComment:
/**
 * Optional callback that runs when the dialog box sends a message to its parent.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 */
members.name: onMessage

members.docComment:
/**
 * Optional callback that runs when the dialog box sends an error.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 */
members.name: onRuntimeError

members.docComment:
/**
 * Optional parameter that defines the width of dialog as a percentage of window. For example, accepts strings such as: '50%', '50'.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 */
members.name: width

members.docComment:
/**
 * Represent an individual gallery control.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: Gallery
refreshData

members.docComment:
/**
 * Represents an individual menu item whose state is set with the call to `requestUpdate`.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: MenuControl
enabled
id
position

members.docComment:
/**
 * Encapsulates the management of the Office ribbon state.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: Ribbon

members.docComment:
/**
 * Stages the updates to be made to the ribbon. Note that this API only requests an update. The actual UI update to the ribbon is controlled by the Office application and hence the exact timing of the ribbon update (or refresh) cannot be determined by the completion of this API.
 *
 * @param input - Represents the updates to be made to the ribbon. Note that the only changes made to the ribbon are those specified in the input parameter. In all other respects, the ribbon is not changed.
 */
members.name: requestUpdate

members.docComment:
/**
 * Represents the parts of the ribbon that the call to `requestUpdate` will change.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: RibbonUpdaterData
tabs

members.docComment:
/**
 * Asynchronous, global, and persistent key-value storage.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * Storage limit is 10 MB per domain, which may be shared by multiple add-ins.
 */
members.name: Storage

members.docComment:
/**
 * Retrieves an item from storage based on its key. Returns a Promise. In the event the Promise does not resolve, returns null.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 *
 * @param key - Key of item to be retrieved. Must be a string.
 */
members.name: getItem

members.docComment:
/**
 * Retrieves multiple items from storage based on their key. Returns a Promise. In the event the Promise does not resolve, returns null.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 *
 * @param keys - Keys of items to be removed. Must be an array of strings.
 */
members.name: getItems

members.docComment:
/**
 * Retrieves an array of all keys from storage. Returns a Promise.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 */
members.name: getKeys

members.docComment:
/**
 * Removes an item from storage based on its key. Returns a Promise.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 *
 * @param key - Key of item to be removed. Must be a string.
 */
members.name: removeItem

members.docComment:
/**
 * Removes multiple items from storage. Returns a Promise.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 *
 * @param keys - Keys of items to be removed. Must be an array of strings.
 */
members.name: removeItems

members.docComment:
/**
 * Sets a key-value pair into storage or updates an existing key-value pair. Returns a Promise.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 *
 * @param key - Key of item to be set. Must be a string.
 *
 * @param value - Must be a string.
 */
members.name: setItem

members.docComment:
/**
 * Sets multiple items into storage or updates multiple items within storage. Returns a Promise.
 *
 * [Api set: SharedRuntime 1.1]
 *
 * @param keyValues - Key-value pairs to be set. Must be strings.
 */
members.name: setItems
storage

members.docComment:
/**
 * Represents an individual tab and the state it should have.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: Tab
controls
id

members.docComment:
/**
 * Encapsulates methods that interact with the Office UI.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: UI
getRibbon
